Detailed Description

A dispatcher is capable of routing and retrieving messages and represents one of the most important base classes of APOXI (e. g. the classes Application and Window are derived from Dispatcher). The whole communication between applications and inside applications is done by messages. A message send to a dispatcher can be treated in OnMessage.

Member Function Documentation

virtual BOOLEAN Dispatcher::OnMessage (  const Message &  msg  )  [protected, pure virtual]
 

Every message routed to a dispatcher may be treated in OnMessage.

Returns:
TRUE is returned, if the message has been dispatched.

Implemented in SimUserDispatcher, HttpHandler, WapHandler, LcsProviderImpl, GltpProviderImpl, SaProviderImpl, SvgPlayer, T9PredictiveInputBox, UsbTransport, Zi8PredictiveInputBox, StackMsgDispatcher, AtlApplication, AtlApplicationPlugin, AtlWindow, AtlItemBox, AtlItemGridWindow, AtlItemMenuWindow, AtlLabelListWindow, BtAvrcpOperationService, BtAvrcpService, BtBppService, BtDevicePairRequest, BtDeviceSearchRequest, BtDeviceTrustRequest, BtDeviceUnpairRequest, BtDeviceUntrustRequest, BtLocalRequest, BtLocalSettings, BtQuerySupportedProfilesRequest, BtRespondAuthorizationRequest, BtSddbService, BtSendPasskeyRequest, BtServiceVerifyRequest, BtSetRemoteDeviceNameRequest, BtDunService, BtFaxService, BtHfService, BtHsService, BtObexService, AbstractMenuAccessor, AtlItemGrid, AtlItemMenu, IndicatorBar, Menu, MenuAccessor, SharedTimer, SoftkeyBar, GenericAudioDevice, AbstractButton, AbstractEditor, AbstractItemGrid, Alert, Component, ContextMenu, Desktop, DrawableObject, ImageBox, ItemBox, ItemTree, Model, TabControl, Window, Application, MessageMapDispatcher, SavingProgressWin, GltpConnApp, and UibFolderWin.

BOOLEAN Dispatcher::RouteMessage (  const Message &  msg  )  [protected, virtual]
 

This method implements the routing logic for all messages. The default implementation is only calling OnMessage. The routing sequence for Application::RouteMessage and Control::RouteMessage is much more complex. When routing messages through several dispatchers, a message which has already been dispatched by a dispatcher won't be routed anymore to other dispatchers.

Reimplemented in T9PredictiveInputBox, Zi8PredictiveInputBox, AtlApplication, Control, and Application.

void Dispatcher::SendSelf (  const Message &  msg  )  [inline]
 

Sends the message msg synchronous to the dispatcher and invokes RouteMessage, which routes the message. For sending a message asynchronous use Message::Post(), which will broadcast the message to all applications, which have subscribed for this message.
